pli-tv-bi-vb-pc73:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc73:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo paripuṇṇavīsativassaṃ kumāribhūtaṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ saṃghena asammataṃ vuṭṭhāpenti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc73:1.4: “etha, sikkhamānā, imaṃ jānātha, imaṃ detha, imaṃ āharatha, iminā attho, imaṃ kappiyaṃ karothā”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc73:1.7: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc73:1.8: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo paripuṇṇavīsativassaṃ kumāribhūtaṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ saṃghena asammataṃ vuṭṭhāpessantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc73:1.9: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo paripuṇṇavīsativassaṃ kumāribhūtaṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ saṃghena asammataṃ vuṭṭhāpentī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc73:1.12: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo paripuṇṇavīsativassaṃ kumāribhūtaṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ saṃghena asammataṃ vuṭṭhāpessanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc73:1.16: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, paripuṇṇavīsativassāya kumāribhūtāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhāya vuṭṭhānasammutiṃ dātuṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc73:1.18: Tāya paripuṇṇavīsativassāya kumāribhūtāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhāya saṃghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā bhikkhunīnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc73:1.19: ‘ahaṃ, ayye, itthannāmā itthannāmāya ayyāya paripuṇṇavīsativassā kumāribhūtā dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhā saṃghaṃ vuṭṭhānasammutiṃ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc73:1.24: Ayaṃ itthannāmā itthannāmāya ayyāya paripuṇṇavīsativassā kumāribhūtā dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhā saṃghaṃ vuṭṭhānasammutiṃ yācati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc73:1.25: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ saṃgho itthannāmāya paripuṇṇavīsativassāya kumāribhūtāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhāya vuṭṭhānasammutiṃ dadeyya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc73:1.28: Ayaṃ itthannāmā itthannāmāya ayyāya paripuṇṇavīsativassā kumāribhūtā dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhā saṃghaṃ vuṭṭhānasammutiṃ yācati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc73:1.29: Saṃgho itthannāmāya paripuṇṇavīsativassāya kumāribhūtāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhāya vuṭṭhānasammutiṃ deti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc73:1.30: Yassā ayyāya khamati itthannāmāya paripuṇṇavīsativassāya kumāribhūtāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhāya vuṭṭhānasammutiyā dānaṃ, sā tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc73:1.32: Dinnā saṃghena itthannāmāya paripuṇṇavīsativassāya kumāribhūtāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhāya vuṭṭhānasammuti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc73:1.33: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc73:1.34: Atha kho bhagavā tā bhikkhuniyo anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā dubbharatāya …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc73:1.35: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc73:1.36: “Yā pana bhikkhunī paripuṇṇavīsativassaṃ kumāribhūtaṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ saṃghena asammataṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc73:2.14: ñattidutiyena kammena vuṭṭhānasammuti na dinnā hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc73:2.17: “Vuṭṭhāpessāmī”ti gaṇaṃ vā ācariniṃ vā pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā pariyesati, sīmaṃ vā sammannati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc73:2.21: Gaṇassa ca ācariniyā ca āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc73:2.29: paripuṇṇavīsativassaṃ kumāribhūtaṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ saṃghena sammataṃ vuṭṭhāpeti,
